trans-unit.source: Provides an implementation of the OLE DB <xref uid="langword_csharp_IConnectionPoint" name="IConnectionPoint" href=""></xref> interface for use by applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
For new development, see <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IConnectionPoint>.

> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
Establishes an advisory connection between the connection point and the caller's sink object.
For new development, see <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IConnectionPoint>.

> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
A reference to the sink to receive calls for the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.
When this method returns, contains the connection cookie.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Creates an enumerator object for iteration through the connections that exist to this connection point.
For new development, see <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IConnectionPoint>.

> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
When this method returns, contains the newly created enumerator.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Returns the IID of the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.
For new development, see <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IConnectionPoint>.

> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
When this parameter returns, contains the IID of the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.

Retrieves the <xref uid="langword_csharp_IConnectionPointContainer" name="IConnectionPointContainer" href=""></xref> interface pointer to the connectable object that conceptually owns this connection point.
For new development, see <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IConnectionPoint>.

> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
When this parameter returns, contains the connectable object's <xref uid="langword_csharp_IConnectionPointContainer" name="IConnectionPointContainer" href=""></xref> interface.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Closes an advisory connection that was previously established through the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IConnectionPoint.Advise*> method.
For new development, see <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IConnectionPoint>.

> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
The connection cookie previously returned from the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IConnectionPoint.Advise*> method.
